title: Per capita consumption of chewing gum in selected countries worldwide 2009 to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index value for 11 number of Countrys.
The maximum Index value 152.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at India where Index value is 10.0.
The highest Country United States has 142.0 more Index value than the lowest Country India.
